about_the_game:
This horror game is impossible for cowards to beat

"Don't Drop The Cake" is a horror game where you must carry a wobbly cake while navigating a space infested with terrifying creatures.

No matter how hard you try to hide your fear, it's obvious

Even if you say, "Fear is not in my vocabulary," deep down, you might be scared. In this game, you must use your mouse to balance the cake and prevent it from falling. If your hands start to shake or you panic, the cake will fall, and your fear will be exposed for everyone to see.

Face Unique and Terrifying Creatures

In this game, you'll encounter uniquely designed, terrifying creatures unlike anything you've seen before. Use your wits and courage to avoid getting caught by them.

Regarding Video Streaming

Feel free to stream.

This game is a prologue version. It is based on the first stage of the main game, but the content and presentation differ from the final version.

name: Don't Drop The Cake: Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Let's deliver a cake to our customer. To reach them, you must traverse a space filled with monstrous creatures. If fear makes you tremble or you drop the cake in panic, you'll face the customer's wrath. This challenge isn't for cowards. Only the brave and composed will succeed. Are you up for it?
